name: Astroyeeter
description:
Entered for the VimJam: Collectables Game Jam! Grab blue and red asteroids with your tractor beam and bring them back to the center wormhole to collect and earn points. Avoid letting bombs or regular asteroids get into the center wormhole, and also avoid letting the bombs hit the valuable asteroids or you!

Credits:

All models by Ebal Studios

Music:

Voice of Eternity - Space Hybrid Music

SutheeComposer - MULTIVERSE

Name came up with the help of Zeema
